reviews.review: 做游戏的人真是个天才，我真是个天才

i loved this damn game, just like the first one it was amazing but this was even more amazing and love how the portal series overall tie in with half life i rate this a 10/10 and i recommend this to anyone who is into half life or just valve games overall, just play the first one first obviously
the traveling portal can't say enough

This game is soo good. you make portals and go through them. the story is good. the only thing is that you should play portal 1 first for the story. both are good portal games and i dont know how i spent 19 hours playing portal but its amazing.
after playing challenge mode i feel like i have a very minor case of serious brain damage

игра хорошая 
+ можно поиграть 
- нет друзей или дауны

《传送门2》，益智且文艺。

对人工智能思考的佳作！

P.S.：
关卡设计和流程长度相比《传送门1代》，丰富了不要太多，V社大大滴良心~
Отличная игра, прикольная механика порталов, интересно проходить в кооперативе. Оч советую.
Игра хорошая, сделанна качественно и даже в 2021 году смотрится отлично. Русская озвучка меня полностью устраивает. Сюжет простой, но интересный.
Игра топ, но иногда нужно слишком сильно подумать, типо найти пиксель куда кинуть портал. А так игра топ.

este es uno de los mejores juegos de la historia y uno de mis juegos favoritos de la vida si quieres hacer tu cerebro pensar mucho tienes la campaña en solitario,en multijugador y las cosas que hacen pruebas de la comunidad este juego es muy bueno
If Halo and Portal 2 have taught me anything, it's that you can never trust circular one-eyed flying robots. 10/10 life lessons.
El juego es tan bueno, que en vez de ver instagram como una persona normal, me dedicaba a jugar en bucle el capítulo "Despertares" hasta llorar.
awesome game good story thing and really fun and using portal gun to go to place faster yeah
yo diria que si glados y su versión papa tubiera culo seria una obra maestra,  pero que se le puede hacer
세일할때 사서 한번쯤 엔딩 볼만한게임 ㅇ ㅁㅇb
I liked the games idea but i hate how sometimes when you load the game you can't control the mouse
一个让人上头的解迷游戏
Just waiting for the portal 4 cuz it's foolishness to wait for portal 3
One of my most favorite games
Un muy buen juego de puzzle y logica, ideal para poder jugar incluso de dos

Calling it a great game is not giving it enough praise. Its one of the best games ever if you dont have it get it. if its on sale or not just get it its a amazing game. evey person should have this in their library. 1000/10 WILL play again.
作为一款十年前的作品，《Portal2》在如今依然散发着其独特的魅力，她向世人证明了fps也能没有战斗，而用纯粹的解谜让玩家获得乐趣。没有人能像VALVE一样做出一款Half-Life，也没人能像VALVE一样做出一款Portal。
me lo compre pa jugar con un amigo 2 horas y aun no pasamos el tutorial de mierda
A game with really nice and well known insiders/jokes

as im writing this i finished the game
i like the story and the game mechanics it self
P O R T A L S
10/10

10/10 best game i have ever played
 i wish i could come down with dementia
so i could play this game for the first time again
One of my favorite puzzle games of all times. Highly recommend. Wish a Portal 3 was in the works. Cmon Valve with all the tease "The Cake is a Lie"
经典好游戏的续作，无脑入吧。

Portal 2 ein sehr geiles puzzle Game wo die rätsel nicht zu schwer sind aber trotzdem nicht einfach. Der Coop Modus ist sehr geil zusammen mit einem freund rätsel lösen im Teamwork sehr geil. Einer der Besten Spieler.
A very good, fun game. Just Portal
acaso tengo que decir algo? no, compralo.
very fun game to play with friends
Nie kupuj chipsów przez tydzień i kup gierke bo jest turbo fajna
I kid you not, she turned herself into a potato. Funniest shit I've ever seen.

One of the best games I've played. Even if the game is only a few hours long, the portal mechanics make up for it; the test chambers, how they introduce the gameplay elements to you, it's perfect. The story will keep you entretained. Has plenty of achievements to boost up that playtime. The Co-Op mode is also a lot of fun if you're playing with a friend.
Br’ish robot be like “you wanna cuppa tea and go to de moon innit”
Если ти имеешь мозги и друга ет тошто нада и сюжет прикольный
Только проходя портал, ты поймёшь, что твой друг настоящая крыса.
Mes meilleurs fou rire et mes plus grande prise de tête, mais toujours avec de l'humour avec mon binome
it's literally portal 2, what else needs to be said. play it and then play it again co-op. GLADoS is my evil lesbian wife and i'm grateful to have her
One of the most innovative games I've ever played. The concept is so unique. The story is nice but slightly lacking enough fulfilment.
Great, well-written story mode that I could play a thousand times without getting bored, as well as fantastic co-op game-play. 10/10
Esta bien. Pero comprate en oferta los 2 portal y vas a ver que esta GOD
this game is amazing. get it but get the first one before.
Quite a good game would definitely recommend
